meta_description.message: Thorium Scroll Tweaker is a small extension that allows you to tweak the scroll speed on websites.

Settings_IgnoredUrls_label.description: Label for the text area that allows to specify a list of URL globs where not to run the extension
Settings_IgnoredUrls_label.message: Disable the extension on these URLs:

Settings_Mode_label.description: Label for the dropdown menu that allows to select the extension's default behavior

Settings_Mode_Always_label.description: Label for the dropdown menu item to always scroll faster

Settings_Mode_Always_description.description: Description for the dropdown menu item to always scroll faster
Settings_Mode_Always_description.message: In this mode, the scroll speed will always be increased except when the Trigger key is pressed.

Settings_Mode_Always_warning.description: Warning for the dropdown menu item to always scroll faster
Settings_Mode_Always_warning.message: Warning: This might not work on some websites and break scrolling completely. In this case, you can add these websites to the list of URLs to ignore below.

Settings_Mode_OnTriggerKeyPressed_label.description: Label for the dropdown menu item to scroll faster only when the trigger key is pressed

Settings_Mode_OnTriggerKeyPressed_descri.description: Description for the dropdown menu item to scroll faster only when the trigger key is pressed
Settings_Mode_OnTriggerKeyPressed_descri.message: In this mode, the scroll speed will be increased only when the Trigger key is pressed.

Settings_ScrollSpeedMultiplier_label.description: Label for the text field that allows to define the scroll speed multiplier

Settings_TriggerKey_label.description: Label for the dropdown menu that allows to define the trigger key

Settings_TriggerKey_ControlLeft_warning.message: Warning : This will override this key's default behavior, which allows you to zoom in / out on websites using your mouse wheel.

Settings_TriggerKey_ShiftLeft_warning.message: Warning : This will override this key's default behavior, which allows you to scroll horizontally.
